original_text: The tribe of Simeon will put up their tents on one side of Reuben's camp. The leader of the tribe of Simeon is Shelumiel, the son of Zurishaddai.
korean_text: 그 곁에 진 칠 자는 시므온 지파라 시므온 자손의 지휘관은 수리삿대의 아들 슬루미엘이요

sentences.original_text: The tribe of Simeon will put up their tents
sentences.korean_translation: 시므온 지파는 그들의 장막을 칠 것입니다

sentences.original_text: on one side of Reuben's camp
The leader of the tribe of Simeon
is Shelumiel, the son of Zurishaddai
